ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Expansion 3
ygData.msgSnippet: What about changes in gravity and atmosphere?  Will monks be able to carry more?  Will gnomes need to tinker out resperators?  Will a lack of oxygen extinguish
ygData.messageBody:
What about changes in gravity and atmosphere? Will monks be able to carry
more? Will gnomes need to tinker out resperators? Will a lack of oxygen
extinguish paladins' swords or reduce the effectiviness of mages' fire pets
to that of a conjured bixie? Will all characters need a certain level of
cold resistance to survive a full night on the dark side? Will prolonged
exposure the the moon's gravity cause health problems upon returning to
Norrath? And will clerics, shaman and druids get Cure Atrophy? Will we
see Norrath in the sky and be able to make out its continents, its weather
conditions, or Freeport at night if someone hands all the guards torches
again?

Ok, ok, "no" to all of the above. But it was fun thinking about it.

Peace
Evulia the dreamer
16 songs, Tunare




firehawk@clou
d9.net To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
cc:
04/19/2001 Subject: Re: [eqbards] Expansion 3
12:29 PM
Please
respond to
eqbards






In a rare moment of defense for Verant I don't think laser guns will be
involved but I would not be surprised to see flying saucers of a sort
involved. There are a flight of them in NRO for ages and then Rodecet's
temple is a flying saucer as well. I think it's more of a look bitmap
change then a game play change

On Thu, 19 Apr 2001 07:39:21 -0700 eqbards@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> "...will introduce EverQuest fans to an enchanting moonscape..."
>
> "...takes voyagers to a satellite hovering ominously above the world of
> Norrath..."
>
> What? I don't really want sci-fi in my fantasy RPG, are we going to be
> shooting mobs with "laser" guns?
>
> -Faras
